decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family:
&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;">The proposed
flank window shown on drawing 230095-PL-D 0011 which serves the guest suite,
shall be non-opening and obscure glazed above 1.75 from flush floor level and once
built, retained and maintained thereafter.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: Location Plan, 230095-PL-D 002, 230095-PL-D 003, 230095-PL-D 004, 230095-PL-D 005, 230095-PL-D 006, 230095-PL-D 007, 230095-PL-D 008, 230095-PL-D 009, 230095-PL-D 010, 230095-PL-D 011, design and access statement, Reasonable exception statement.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Single storey side extension; front porch; external alterations (demolition of attached garage)
